info.help_text:
Report gives information about traffic volume, PDP contexts and RABs usage for each traffic class (QoS priority class) / bearer class (bit rate) over the Iu interface, in case SGSN is using ATCA HW.
Note, to see the full content of this report the optional feature code 1008 must be purchased and activated in the SGSN.
Use case specific instructions:
- This reports is relevant only with ATCA hardware;

- ?Traffic class? (TC_ID) can contain following values:
0 = background
1 = interactive THP 1
2 = interactive THP 2
3 = interactive THP 3
4 = streaming
5 = conversational

- ?Bearer class? (BC_ID) can contain following values:
0 = 32 kbps
1 = 64 kbps
2 = 136 kbps (DL MBR over this in 2G only with EDGE)
3 = 256 kbps
4 = 512 kbps
5 = 1 Mbps
6 = 1,5 Mbps (-> HSUPA)
7 = 2 Mbps
8 = 4 Mbps (-> HSDPA)
9 = 6 Mbps
10 = 8 Mbps
11 = 12 Mbps
12 = 16 Mbps (not HSUPA)
13 = 21 Mbps (not HSUPA)
14 = 28 Mbps (not HSUPA)
15 = 42 Mbps (not HSUPA)
16 = 46 Mbps
17 = 84 Mbps
18 = 168 Mbps
